profile:
At Millers Painting We know just how important your home or commercial property is to you and we are dedicated to providing a high quality paint job that will look great for years to come.

From our extreme detail on preparation down to the final finishing coat. Millers Painting takes great pride in our work. Our team of professionals offer many years of experience so nothing goes unnoticed. We spend 90% of our time on preparation. Without the right prep the product could fail and the end result wont be as fabulous. From patching your walls, priming, caulking baseboards, window, and door trim. Pole sanding your wall before painting and in between coats, to provide the smoothest looks and finish. For exterior work we scrape off old paint and sand.  We also restore or replace any old rotten wood. Pressure wash to make sure all dirt and debris is removed for maximum adhesion of paint and stain.
* References Available 
* Fully Insured $2,000,000 Residential and commercial
* WSIB $1,000,000
* Free estimates
* 5 Year warranty on interior repaints
* All employees are certified with, Working at Heights, Fall Safety, WHMIS, Background checks

Areas Served
Ottawa, Kemptville, Kanata, Barrhaven, Nepean, Manotick, Stittsville, Carp, Westboro, Riverside, Orleans, Cumberland, Gloucester, Brockville, Prescott, Spencerville,
services: Interior and exterior painting and stain for residential and commercial.  Roof painting, Stipple removal, Power washing, Gutter cleaning, Driveway sealing.
specialities:
Interior & exterior paint/stain, Deck & fence paint/stain, Roof painting, Stipple removal,
Power washing
payment_method: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Cheque, E-transfer/Debit

profile: As Kemptvilles premier custom painting company, we are committed to delivering customer service that is second to none. We offer a wide range of services to meet all of your residential painting needs. Big job or small, we have you covered. We strive to provide honest, reliable, residential painting services that stand head and shoulders above the rest. We combine the industry's best paint with our passion for detail to exceed your expectations. We work around your busy schedule and consult with you on all aspects of color selection and color coordination for your project to ensure that the project is completed according to your preferences.
services:
Interior and exterior 
Wall paper removal and installation
Fine spray finishing of cabinets
Faux finishes
Hard to reach surfaces 
Intricate projects
specialities:

Spray finishing 
Wood staining and refinishing
